name: isobel
description: ðŸŽ§ a self-hosted Discord music bot that doesn't suck
author: Max Isom <hi@maxisom.me>, Christian Kling <soulwax@madtec.org>

scripts.start: npm run prisma:generate && npm run env:set-database-url -- tsx src/scripts/migrate-and-start.ts
scripts.dev: npm run prisma:generate && npm run env:set-database-url -- tsx watch src/scripts/start.ts
scripts.debug: pm2 delete isobel || true; npm run dev
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run web:build
scripts.deploy: npm run build:all && npm run start:all:prod
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npm run pm2:start:dev && npm run web:pm2:start:dev
scripts.health: curl -s http://localhost:3002/health || echo 'Health check failed - bot may not be running'
scripts.health:web: curl -s http://localhost:3001/health || echo 'Health check failed - web may not be running'
scripts.install:web: test -d web && cd web && (command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm install || npm install) || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:dev: test -d web && cd web && npm run dev || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:dev:all: test -d web && cd web && npm run dev:all || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:build: test -d web && cd web && npm run build || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:lint: test -d web && cd web && npm run lint || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:preview: test -d web && cd web && npm run preview || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:pm2:start: test -d web && cd web && npm run pm2:start || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:pm2:start:dev: test -d web && cd web && npm run pm2:start:dev || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:pm2:start:prod: test -d web && cd web && npm run pm2:start:prod || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:pm2:stop: test -d web && cd web && npm run pm2:stop || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:pm2:restart: test -d web && cd web && npm run pm2:restart || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:pm2:delete: test -d web && cd web && npm run pm2:delete || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:pm2:logs: test -d web && cd web && npm run pm2:logs || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:pm2:logs:web: test -d web && cd web && npm run pm2:logs:web || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:pm2:logs:auth: test -d web && cd web && npm run pm2:logs:auth || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.web:pm2:status: test -d web && cd web && npm run pm2:status || echo 'Web directory not found'
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && (test -d web && cd web && npm run lint || echo 'Web lint skipped - web directory may not exist')
scripts.lint:fix:all: npm run lint:fix && (test -d web && cd web && npm run lint -- --fix || echo 'Web lint:fix skipped - web directory may not exist')
scripts.typecheck:all: npm run typecheck && (test -d web && cd web && npx tsc --noEmit || echo 'Web typecheck skipped - web directory may not exist')
scripts.start:all: npm run pm2:start:prod && npm run web:pm2:start
scripts.start:all:dev: npm run pm2:start:dev && npm run web:pm2:start:dev
scripts.start:all:prod: npm run pm2:start:prod && npm run web:pm2:start:prod
scripts.stop:all: npm run pm2:stop && npm run web:pm2:stop
scripts.restart:all: npm run pm2:restart && npm run web:pm2:restart
